name: Hotel Bennett
description: A trendy haven in Charleston, where millennials flock for stylish vibes and modern luxuries. Always in the know, always in style.

name: Zero George
description: Gray brick charm meets old-school vibes, with a touch of elegance. Rent a bike, and enjoy the perfect mix of history and relaxation.

name: The Restoration
description: A signature Charleston icon with its bold, light-blue entrance. This spot captures Southern elegance and hospitality at its finest.

name: The Loutrel
description: A hidden gem Jack Logan stumbled upon,perfectly curated and tucked into the right corner of Charleston. Gorgeous, unique, and truly one of a kind.

name: W Nashville
description: This hot spot in the Gulch is where architecture meets fun. A trendy, happening hotel that's always buzzing.

name: The Thompson Nashville
description: A personal favorite,this chic Nashville stay offers stunning views, especially from a corner suite. A perfect city retreat.

name: The Grand Hotel Golf Resort & Spa
description: An Alabama getaway filled with southern charm, activities galore, and a relaxed luxury vibe. Perfect for that big, luxury Southern retreat.

name: Montage Deer Valley
description: Snow-covered elegance meets cozy luxury in this Deer Valley treasure. Shop their cozy apparel and bask in wintery goodness.

name: Amangiri
description: World-renowned and jaw-dropping, with scenery that will leave you breathless in the Utah desert. This is where nature and luxury collide.

name: L'Auberge de Sedona
description: A luxurious desert escape with all the fancy touches you expect. Desert chic at its finest.

name: Enchantment Resort
description: A massive resort complex tucked into the stunning desert landscape. Enormous, beautiful, and impossible to forget.

name: The Langham Chicago
description: A bright, naturally lit gem in Chicago's luxury hotel scene. Perfect location, perfect standard,just what you'd expect from a world-class stay.

name: The Joule Dallas
description: Dallas' most unique stay with a standout pool and prime access to Highland Park. Trendy, chic, and full of character.

name: Four Seasons Seattle
description: Classic Four Seasons luxury with a cozy twist in the rainy city of Seattle. Expect everything that defines this iconic brand.

name: Four Seasons Resort Rancho Encantado
description: A peaceful New Mexico retreat with ranch vibes, mostly catering to an older crowd. Calm, relaxing, and beautifully scenic.

name: Blackberry Mountain
description: Fast becoming the talk of the luxury world with its stunning Smoky Mountain views. Popular, peaceful, and perfectly luxurious.

name: The Mark
description: An icon in New York City, home to Met Gala celebrities and a sleek black-and-white aesthetic. A classic in every way.

name: The Palace
description: Midtown luxury that's been featured in Gossip Girl,classic NYC glamour. Always a solid choice for a grand stay.

name: 1 Hotel Central Park
description: Cozy, yet elegant with stunning views of Central Park. A smaller, more intimate vibe that's big on charm.

name: Soho Grand Hotel
description: Golden, luxe, and perfectly positioned in the heart of the action. The nightlux scene right by Carbone,can't beat that.

name: The Beekman
description: The essence of New York City sophistication and luxury. Known for its history, and let's not forget Anna Delvey's infamous stay.

name: Baccarat Hotel
description: Dripping in diamonds and Baccarat jewels, this is next-level luxury. A hotel that dazzles in every way.

name: Times Square Edition
description: Step into a sleek, black-and-white world high above the chaos of Times Square. An ultra-modern escape from the neon lights below.

name: Gurney's
description: Chic Hamptons vibes meet surf lodge cool. The ultimate spot for a stylish beach escape, a little slice of Montauk heaven.

name: The Roundtree
description: The closest you can have to a Hamptons house without owning one. This timelessly luxe earthy property and it's service makes you feel right at home. Amenities galore.

name: Sunset Beach
description: Yellow-and-white striped perfection right on Shelter Island's quiet beach. Cute, lively, and perfectly positioned for beachside fun.

name: The Pridwin
description: A relaxed counterpart to Sunset Beach with tennis courts, docks, and laid-back Shelter Island charm.

name: Crow's Nest
description: A hotspot for wealthy New Yorkers, this adorable hideaway offers stunning villas but sits far out in Montauk. Cute and secluded with a luxe edge.

name: 1 Hotel Brooklyn Bridge
description: A luxurious escape from the city with incredible views of the Brooklyn Bridge. Spa amenities galore, perfect for a relaxing city break.

name: Delamar Greenwich
description: Coastal New England luxury right on the harbor with an amazing brunch spot. Classic, elegant, and perfect for a New England escape.

name: Delamar Southport
description: Much like its Greenwich counterpart, this hotel brings the New England charm,minus the water views but packed with coastal luxury.

name: The Breakers
description: The Palm Beach icon with endless amenities,everything from nail salons to dry cleaning, all right on the beach. A must-stay for anyone visiting.

name: Four Seasons Surf Club
description: Beachfront luxe with the signature Four Seasons touch. Known for its world-class service and stunning views,truly a standout in Miami.

name: The Setai
description: An Asian-inspired luxury gem in Miami Beach. Known for its over-the-top concierge service and ultimate Miami vibes.

name: Faena
description: A vibrant, red-themed beauty just steps away from South Beach attractions. Luxe, artsy, and oh-so-cool.

name: Kimpton EPIC Hotel
description: A budget-friendly Miami stay with unbeatable views of the Intercoastal. Perfect for staycations and a laid-back Miami getaway.

name: Montage Laguna Beach
description: An oceanfront dream with fire pits, sweeping views, and top-notch staff. Everything about this place screams luxury and relaxation.

name: Rosewood Miramar Beach
description: A favorite of Kourtney Kardashian, this California beach escape offers spacious rooms and laid-back luxury. The perfect spot for a relaxing getaway.

name: Beverly Hills Hotel
description: An iconic LA experience. This legendary hotel offers a glimpse into Hollywood's golden age while delivering world-class luxury.

name: Chateau Marmont
description: The pinnacle of LA luxury with jaw-dropping rooms and breathtaking views of the city. A stay here is pure opulence.

name: Nobu Ryokan
description: A beachfront Malibu gem, this luxurious stay offers everything you could want for a chic and serene escape.

name: Topping Rose House
description: Known for its central Bridgehampton location, this Hamptons gem boasts stunning lawns and impeccable service. A classic luxury retreat.

name: The Loren
description: Owned by an awesome, down-to-earth female hotelier, this boutique hotel offers cute rooms and beachy luxury on Bermuda's pink sands.

name: Rosewood Bermuda
description: Another Bermuda treasure, this one features the signature Rosewood standards and a breathtaking pink sand beach. Perfect for a dreamy getaway.

name: Cliff House
description: With jaw-dropping views, this Maine escape combines outdoorsy charm with luxurious relaxation. The ultimate nature retreat.

name: Newport Harbor Hotel
description: Set on its own island with easy access to Newport town, this hotel is as convenient as it is luxurious. Perfect for exploring Newport.

name: White Elephant
description: A classic, boutique Nantucket stay that oozes aesthetic charm. Known for its Palm Beach sister hotel, it's a New England favorite.

name: Porches Inn at MASS MoCA
description: This cute, sleepy cottage hotel in the Berkshires offers incredible service and is just across from the MASS MoCA museum. A unique little gem.

name: Stowe Mountain Resort
description: A snowy retreat. Hit the slopes and come back to crepes, hot cocoa, spacious rooms, and a huge swimming pool and hot tub map.

name: The Pearl
description: Set on pristine white sands along Highway 38, this charming beachside hotel has great service, a lively bar, and a prime in-town location.

name: Omni Amelia Island
description: Private, remote, and right on the beach,this luxurious resort offers pure relaxation on Florida's coast.

name: Ritz-Carlton Fort Lauderdale
description: Classic Ritz-Carlton luxury on Fort Lauderdale Beach. Enough said.

name: Ritz-Carlton Amelia Island
description: Another Florida favorite,luxury, seclusion, and unbeatable beach vibes.

name: The Ocean Club
description: A Four Seasons masterpiece where you'll never need to leave the resort. It's everything you could want in a Bahamian escape.

name: Eden Roc Cap Cana
description: A gated beachfront villa community where families and friends can relax in style. Expect stellar service and stunning ocean views.

name: Round Hill Hotel & Villas
description: A hillside retreat in Jamaica where billionaires flock for privacy, great golf, and even better restaurants.

name: Casa de Campo
description: A household name for villa rentals, this resort operates like its own city,bars, nightclubs, beaches, and every amenity imaginable.

name: Tryall Club
description: A luxurious villa community with top-notch golfing and water sports. Private staff and beachfront restaurants add to the magic.

name: Four Seasons Anguilla
description: A breathtaking beach retreat set above a pristine shoreline. Open-air restaurants, beach bars, and endless luxury await.

name: Secret Bay
description: Frequently ranked as the number one resort in travel magazines, this remote hideaway boasts stunning villas perched above deep blue waters.

name: Sugar Beach
description: Family-friendly luxury with gorgeous views of the iconic Petite Piton. Enjoy a laid-back restaurant by the water and take in the magic of St. Lucia.

name: Firefly Sunset Resort
description: Known for its spring break vibes, this small resort offers golf carts, a close-knit community, and endless fun in the sun.

name: Oil Nut Bay
description: A billionaire's paradise with sleek villas and clean, modern designs. Endless views and luxurious perfection await.

name: The Dunmore
description: A preppy classic with light blue hues, this Harbour Island spot is the place to see and be seen for dinner.

name: Jumby Bay Island
description: A private island paradise owned by the Oetker Collection, with pristine beaches, private villas, and world-class service. The ultimate tropical escape.

name: Pink Sands
description: A beachfront gem with lovely beach bars, golf carts, and charming villas. The perfect place to unwind in paradise.

name: Bahama House
description: A boutique experience resort with personalized concierge service, a private pool, and only a few intimate rooms. Pure relaxation meets luxury.

name: Mustique Island
description: Where billionaires retreat from millionaires,this private island offers jaw-dropping luxury and endless serenity.

name: Montage Los Cabos
description: A stunning Montage compound right on the golden sand beaches of Los Cabos. Good vibes, impeccable service, and beachside luxury.

name: Paradero Todos Santos
description: A desert retreat built with industrial chic flair. This stylish hideaway is as unique as it is beautiful.

name: One&Only Mandarina
description: A jungle escape with deep blues, hummingbirds, and lush tropical vibes. An otherworldly experience in Mexico's natural paradise.

name: Four Seasons Peninsula Papagayo
description: A secluded paradise with both black sand and golden beaches. Perfect for zip-lining, exploring, and pure relaxation. Kim Kardashian approved.

name: Awasi Patagonia
description: A health and wellness retreat tucked away in Chile's stunning wilderness. Pure tranquility and adventure await.

name: Hotel Esencia
description: A highly ranked boutique hotel in Tulum with an effortless blend of luxury and laid-back beach vibes.

name: Hermitage Bay
description: Luxurious and stunning, this beachside resort offers pristine beauty and total relaxation.

name: Belmond Hotel das Cataratas
description: Nestled right by Brazil's majestic waterfalls, this hotel is nothing short of breathtaking. A perfect tropical retreat.

name: Casa San Agustin
description: A cute boutique hotel in the heart of Cartagena, offering luxury, culture, and a strong sense of safety. Unique and vibrant.

name: Ritz Paris
description: Known worldwide as one of the most luxurious hotels, the Ritz Paris features gold-studded details and classic Parisian elegance.

name: Le Bristol
description: A favorite among Upper East Siders and celebrities, with an incredible restaurant and luxurious rooms. Parisian opulence at its best.

name: Solly Hotel Paris (Near Le Marais)
description: Located in one of the city's cutest neighborhoods, Le Marais, this hotel offers prime shopping and local charm.

name: Hotel du Cap-Eden-Roc
description: The epitome of luxury on the French Riviera. Prime luxury, stunning views, and a favorite of the world's elite.

name: Maybourne Riviera
description: My favorite on the South of France,built into a cliff with jaw-dropping views and incredible architecture. Enjoy aesthetic dining and the best cappuccinos around.

name: Chateau Saint-Martin & Spa
description: A massive castle in the French countryside with old-world charm. Perfect for anyone seeking a cool, classic French escape.

name: Cheval Blanc
description: Of course, it's amazing. One of Courchevel's finest skiing hotels,expect impeccable service and stunning slopes.

name: Hotel de Paris
description: Flashy, opulent, and dripping in wealth. Expect tourists gawking at the luxury cars and a prime location right near Monte Carlo's shopping mecca.

name: Eden Rock Villa Rental
description: The ultimate stay in St. Barths. Get all the privacy of your own villa, plus breakfast delivered and full access to Eden Rock's luxurious amenities.

name: Four Seasons Megeve
description: A massive Four Seasons compound, perfect for skiing in the French Alps. An elegant retreat with all the luxury touches.

name: Six Senses Courchevel
description: Sustainable luxury meets high-end skiing. The ultimate winter retreat for the eco-conscious traveler.

name: L'Apogee Courchevel
description: A bold, luxurious resort that elevates both skiing and opulence to new heights. Ski-in, ski-out perfection.

name: Hotel Mont-Blanc
description: Similar to L'Apogee,luxury skiing with stunning views and top-notch amenities. Ski-in, ski-out in the heart of the Alps.

name: Coeur de Megeve
description: A charming boutique hotel in an equally charming town. A quaint, romantic escape in the French Alps.

name: Belmond La Residencia
description: Flowery, Spanish charm with stunning old-world architecture. A perfect spot for weddings and romantic getaways.

name: Ca's Xorc
description: Small and romantic,don't miss dinner here, even if you're not staying. The restaurant is a must-visit.

name: Nobu Ibiza
description: Bold, Euro vibes with insane luxury and insane prices. An Ibiza favorite for those who want to splurge.

name: Hacienda Na Xamena
description: Built into the cliffs with incredible views and comfortable rooms. Pure Ibiza magic.

name: W Barcelona
description: Right on the beach and perfect for party vibes. Barcelona's go-to for sleek, modern luxury.

name: The Standard Ibiza
description: A super sleek and modern Ibiza escape,chic and stylish in every way.

name: Sublime Comporta
description: Mountains, beach, and everything in between. Wooden villas with rustic charm and a modern edge.

name: Six Senses Douro Valley
description: Incredible views, amazing culture, and serene luxury. A true gem in the heart of Portugal's wine country.

name: Le Sirenuse
description: A top honeymoon destination with breathtaking views and a famous restaurant. Gorgeous from every angle.

name: Villa d'Este
description: A true architectural masterpiece on Lake Como. Ultra-luxe, ultra-expensive, and totally worth it.

name: Il Sereno
description: A top-rated Lake Como hotel with stunning modern architecture. Exclusivity and luxury all in one.

name: Calilo
description: Unique in every way, this Greek escape offers stunning pools and endless charm.

name: Istoria
description: A boutique Santorini hotel with all the charm you'd expect from the iconic island. Classic, chic, and beautiful.

name: Katikies Chromata
description: A quintessential Santorini hotel with stunning views and all the island's classic charm. Pure perfection.

name: Omnia
description: Ski-in, ski-out luxury at its finest. This sleek mountain retreat lights up at night for a magical Alpine experience.

name: Whitepod
description: Live in a pod on the mountain,totally ski-in, ski-out, and a one-of-a-kind experience. Take a snow cat up for ultimate adventure.

name: The Woodward
description: A classy, preppy, and elegant stay in Geneva. Sophistication with stunning lake views.

name: Beau-Rivage Palace
description: A grand, white-and-gold Swiss palace right on the water. Old-fashioned luxury at its finest.

name: Hotel La Palma
description: An amazing hotel in Capri with an incredible beach club. Ultimate luxury on the Italian island.

name: Minthis
description: A truly unique resort in Cyprus with stunning scenery and luxury that stands out.

name: Deplar Farm
description: An experiential resort where LeBron James and Bill Gates have stayed. Immerse yourself in Icelandic culture and unforgettable experiences.

name: Park Hyatt Kyoto
description: A luxurious stay in the heart of Japan,perfect for those who love elegance and tradition.

name: Bulgari Tokyo
description: From the world-renowned Bvlgari brand, this luxurious hotel in Japan is the epitome of class and style.

name: The Upper House
description: A chic, cool hotel in Hong Kong that offers a modern and stylish vibe.

name: Mandarin Oriental
description: The classic luxury stay in Hong Kong, renowned for its history and impeccable service.

name: Raffles Singapore
description: The landmark hotel of Singapore, known for its luxurious service and timeless elegance.

name: Marina Bay Sands
description: An iconic mall, hotel, and casino complex in Singapore, famous for its sky-high infinity pool and larger-than-life amenities.

name: Parkroyal Collection Pickering
description: A massive eco-resort with a grey exterior overgrown with greenery. Sustainable luxury with a stunning pool.

name: Four Seasons Bora Bora
description: An amazing resort in Bora Bora with iconic overwater bungalows. Ultimate island luxury.

name: Cap Juluca
description: Another Anguilla gem, offering pristine beaches and unparalleled service.

name: Sirru Fen Fushi
description: A private island resort in the Maldives offering excellent rates for a slice of paradise.

name: Soneva Fushi
description: The highest-rated, most luxurious hotel in the Maldives. Pure indulgence in every way.

name: Six Senses Kanuhura
description: An eco-luxury paradise that's part of the renowned Six Senses family. Sustainable bliss in the Maldives.

name: Four Seasons Resort Maldives at Landaa Giraavaru
description: A luxurious Four Seasons stay in the Maldives,classic luxury meets tropical paradise.

name: Six Senses Zil Pasyon
description: Another incredible eco-luxury resort from Six Senses, offering unparalleled beauty and relaxation.

name: One&Only Le Saint Geran
description: A unique and stunning destination in Mauritius, offering the best of island luxury.

name: Four Seasons Mauritius at Anahita
description: Another incredible Four Seasons resort, this time in Mauritius, offering world-class service and serene beaches.

name: Taj Exotica Havelock Island
description: A cool beachside resort with a friendly staff and stunning beachfront location.

name: One&Only The Palm
description: Opulent luxury on the famous Palm Jumeirah, offering world-class service and stunning views.

name: Burj Al Arab
description: The landmark hotel of Dubai,the only seven-star hotel in the world, known for its unmatched luxury.

name: Six Senses Shaharut
description: A luxurious desert resort in Israel, offering breathtaking views and unmatched experiences.

name: Wadi Rum Bubble Luxotel
description: Glamping bubbles in the Jordanian desert,a once-in-a-lifetime experience.

name: Royal Mansour
description: A luxurious, money-no-object resort that defines opulence in every way.

name: Aman Marrakech
description: Private villas, beautiful pools, and ultimate relaxation in this ultra-luxury Moroccan escape.

name: La Mamounia
description: Infamous for its history (and Anna Delvey's scandal), this Moroccan resort offers luxury and rich cultural experiences.

name: Londolozi Tree Camp
description: An African safari resort that blends luxury with adventure. A bucket-list stay.

name: Ulusaba Private Game Reserve
description: Another top-tier African safari resort with incredible wildlife experiences and luxury accommodations.

name: Four Seasons Safari Lodge Serengeti
description: A peaceful Four Seasons resort set in the heart of the Serengeti. Expect incredible wildlife and serene luxury.

name: &Beyond Ngorongoro Crater Lodge
description: A luxurious safari lodge in Tanzania that offers an unforgettable African adventure.

name: One&Only Gorilla's Nest
description: A once-in-a-lifetime resort in Rwanda, known for its outlandish luxury and proximity to gorilla trekking.

name: AYA Niseko
description: An incredible ski resort in Japan that offers top-notch winter experiences.

name: Hotel Xcaret
description: The best all-inclusive resort in Mexico, offering endless activities and luxury accommodations.

name: Four Seasons Palm Beach
description: An incredible Four Seasons resort close to Mar-a-Lago, offering unmatched hospitality.

name: Tivoli Carvoeiro Algarve Resort
description: Set on the cliffs of the Algarve with stunning beach views and enormous bathtubs. True coastal luxury.

name: Six Senses Grenada
description: A remote eco-luxury resort with a focus on sustainability. Incredibly opulent rooms and plenty to do.

name: The Colony Hotel
description: A cute boutique hotel in Palm Beach with a signature pink exterior. A charming, intimate stay.

name: Jumeirah, Port de Soller
description: Perched on a dramatic cliffside overlooking the Mediterranean, this Mallorca retreat combines breathtaking views with luxurious tranquility.

name: Les Airelles Saint Tropez
description: An elegant retreat in the French Riviera, perfect for basking in luxury by the Mediterranean.

name: Cheval Blanc St. Barths
description: A secluded haven in St. Barths, offering exquisite French Caribbean charm and tranquility.

name: Gyp Sea St. Barths
description: Beachfront relaxation meets vibrant bohemian vibes at this eclectic St. Barths gem.

name: Rosewood St. Barths
description: Ultimate luxury in St. Barths, where breathtaking views and top-tier amenities reign supreme.

name: One&Only Cape Town
description: Experience Cape Townís vibrant culture from this chic waterfront oasis with sweeping mountain views.

name: COMO Parrot Cay
description: A serene, private island escape with a focus on wellness and barefoot luxury.

name: Cap Rocat
description: Historic architecture meets modern elegance in Mallorcaís stunning coastline.

name: Raffles Praslin
description: An exclusive Seychelles hideaway with private villas and crystal-clear waters at every turn.

name: The Brando
description: Sustainable luxury at its finest on a private Polynesian island surrounded by turquoise waters.

name: Jade Mountain
description: Nestled between the Pitons, this St. Lucia retreat offers jaw-dropping views and personalized service.

name: Amanzoe
description: A tranquil sanctuary on the Greek Peloponnese, perfect for a secluded, luxury escape.

name: HÙtel de Crillon
description: Parisian opulence at its finest, blending historic grandeur with contemporary luxury.

name: Fogo Island Inn
description: A remote retreat in Newfoundland, with unique design and views over rugged Atlantic waters.

name: One&Only Palmilla
description: Oceanfront luxury in Los Cabos, where privacy and unparalleled service set the scene.

name: Four Seasons Resort and Residences Jackson Hole
description: A mountain escape with unparalleled access to nature and luxe alpine amenities.

name: WaterColor, 30A
description: A laid-back, beachfront getaway along Floridaís Gulf Coast, perfect for sun-soaked relaxation.

name: Sea Island Georgia
description: A classic Southern resort blending world-class golf and coastal luxury on the Atlantic.

name: 1 Hotel Hanalei Bay
description: An eco-friendly escape with natural beauty, modern design, and sweeping ocean views.

name: Acqualina Resort & Residences
description: Iconic beachside luxury in Florida, combining opulence and relaxation with unparalleled views.

name: Virgin Hotels
description: A stylish urban retreat in NYC, blending modernity and comfort in the heart of Manhattan.

name: Rock House
description: A cliffside retreat in Turks & Caicos, with stunning views and an emphasis on privacy and tranquility.
